name: Memories Off 2nd - Promotion Disc [SDC]
description: Memories Off 2nd (メモリーズオフ セカンド, Memorīzu Ofu Sekando) is a Japanese romance visual novel developed by KID for the Dreamcast and PlayStation consoles. It is the second game in the Memories Off series. The game was released for the PlayStation Portable on May 29, 2008.
